properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
[Enter rejoice and celebrate
this is the day that the Lord has made
let us rejoice and be glad in it..and be glad in it] x2.
celebrate, celebrate in the Lord.
Let us rejoice and be glad in it...and be glad in it.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Joyfully shout (oh let us rejoice) you in His presence,
Give praise to the (in the house of God) glory to God,
In hymns and dance sing out to God,
Let us rejoice in the house of the Lord;
in the house of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Let all creation (oh let us rejoice) worship and praise Him,
Extolling His (in the house of God) marvelous fame,
In hymns and dance sing out to God,
Let us rejoice in the house of the Lord;
In the house of the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come forth and see (oh let us rejoice) the great work of God,
Fall on your knee (in the house of God) adore Him in truth,
In hymns and dance sing out to God,
Let us rejoice in the house of the Lord;
In the house of the Lord.
